data.what_is: Gamooga is a marketing automation solution which helps e-businesses deliver personalized actions at their customers through various channels such as email, web, mobile, social and display.
data.product_description: Gamooga is a marketing automation solution which helps e-businesses deliver personalized actions at their customers through various channels such as email, web, mobile, social and display.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: As reported in 10 Gamooga reviews. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 10 Gamooga reviews. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: As reported in 10 Gamooga reviews. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 10 Gamooga reviews. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: As reported in 10 Gamooga reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.  This feature was mentioned in 10 Gamooga reviews.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Optimization
features.content: Optimizes marketing campaigns for mobile devices.

features.name: Integrations - Mobile Marketing
features.content: Integrates advertising/campaigns into mobile applications, games, and mobile browsers.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Facilitates global text message and mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. 10 reviewers of Gamooga have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: As reported in 10 Gamooga reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. This feature was mentioned in 10 Gamooga reviews.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: As reported in 10 Gamooga reviews. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI. This feature was mentioned in 10 Gamooga reviews.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. This feature was mentioned in 10 Gamooga reviews.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Application Attribution
features.content: Attributes app installs to the marketing campaigns and media sources that drove it.

features.name: Campaign Analysis
features.content: Measures impact and effectiveness of mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Uninstall Tracking
features.content: Measures user-level uninstall insights.

features.name: Custom Dashboards
features.content: Creates custom data views to suit every team member's needs.

features.name: Proximity Marketing
features.content: Collects geo-location data on mobile users to customize relevant campaigns.

features.name: Push Notifications
features.content: Pushes notifications or text messages to mobile devices

features.name: Bulk SMS
features.content: Provides templates for mass mobile messaging campaigns

features.name: Two-Way Text Messaging
features.content: Facilitates two-way text messaging to encourage consumer engagement and loyalty

features.name: Email Campaigns
features.content: Personalizes and optimizes email mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Audience Segmentation
features.content: Identifies the most granular audience segments based on actions, inactions, and user properties.

features.name: Customize
features.content: Allow users to customize their messages.

features.name: Scheduling
features.content: Schedule push notifications to be delivered at a specific date and time, or set an expiration for time-bound messages

features.name: Retarget
features.content: Retarget your messages based on previous user engagement.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment audience based on device type, location, demographics, customer behavior, etc.

features.name: Triggered Notifications
features.content: Automate notifications based on user behavior

features.name: Coupons and Promotions
features.content: Sends out coupons and promotions to reward and entice mobile device users.

features.name: ROI Tracking
features.content: Helps marketers measure return on investment (ROI) by analyzing campaign effectiveness against costs

features.name: Data Collection
features.content: Gathers data about the effectiveness, impact, and reach of marketing campaigns

features.name: Customer Insights
features.content: Collects and reports on data relating to customer journeys, preferences, and history

features.name: Multi-User Access
features.content: Allows multiple users access to a unified, transparent overview of analytics, dashboards, and campaign results

features.name: Spend Management
features.content: Includes features for budgeting, forecasting, and managing marketing investments

features.name: White Label
features.content: Offers a white labeling service for agencies or resellers to customize platform branding

features.name: Campaign Insights
features.content: Analyzes historical and current marketing campaigns to inform future strategy

features.name: Reports and Dashboards
features.content: Creates reports and dashboards to analyze results of campaigns

features.name: Campaign Stickiness
features.content: Identifies which marketing campaigns resolved in open or closed opportunities

features.name: Multichannel Tracking
features.content: Collects marketing campaign performance data across multiple channels

features.name: Brand Optimization
features.content: Provides opportunities for brands and businesses to fix or modify existing or future campaigns via feedback

features.name: Predictive Analytics
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence (AI) to predict campaign outcomes and suggest actions for optimization

features.name: Campaign Performance
features.content: Track and report on performance metrics and conversions

features.name: Audience Insights
features.content: Report on audience demographics and engagement

features.name: Reporting and Analytics
features.content: Provides reporting and analytics tools to quantify the results of the experiment.

features.name: Heatmaps
features.content: Provides heatmap functionality to assess what parts of the website visitors are engaging with most.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test variations of a push notification on a portion of users and track conversions

features.name: Personalization
features.content: Personalize messages with contextual data such as customer names or product recommendations

features.name: Rich Notifications
features.content: Enhance messages with images, emojis, animated gifs, or videos

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Integrate with third-party marketing or e-commerce software

features.name: Multivariate testing capacities
features.content: Allows for the testing of multiple variables at a time during a single test.

features.name: Concurrent Testing
features.content: Allows multiple experiments to be deployed simultaneously.

features.name: Mobile Testing
features.content: Allows mobile web pages to be tested during A/B experiments.

features.name: WYSIWYG
features.content: What You See is What You Get (WYSIWYG) features allow the editing of web pages without HTML. This means you can directly edit pages with images and text without any coding.

features.name: AI/Machine Learning
features.content: Uses algorithms and continuous data entry to enable the technology to develop insights and optimize testing.

features.name: Little to No Coding
features.content: Requires little to no knowledge of coding. Usually this means it comes with prewritten code.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing automation and sending all the customer attributes to gamooga
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
As our company is going onmichannel, gamooga was providing best omnichannel personalization experience and smooth channel wise campaigns

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
If was not cost effective and was difficult for a non marketing background person, me and my team took training from Seniors to use basic features and after integration it affected website performance in bad way

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
Web personalization was the main issue it was solving it did help us to reach right audience and hence increase the engagement they even develop new feature as per our requirement

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Gamooga?
review_question_answers.answer: As our company is going onmichannel, gamooga was providing best omnichannel personalization experience and smooth channel wise campaigns

review_question_answers.answer: Web personalization was the main issue it was solving it did help us to reach right audience and hence increase the engagement they even develop new feature as per our requirement

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
A good tool to rely on with its powerful analytics feature to perform smooth Marketing automation on a large segment audience.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
A limited use case for Web personalization feature for customer engagement on the website when compared to other competitors in the Market.

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
The tool has helped to target the right audience with the help of micro-segmentation feature, thereby bringing the right audience on the website

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
I use Gamooga for marketing in a finance-based company. It is tough to reach people to tell them about your products because mostly they ignore them. I tried various marketing tools, but some were costly, and some are not touched my expectation, but "gamooga" was Quite impressive.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
Gamooga has lots of exciting features which are very basic. Anyone wants to connect easily with you. So I did not get any negative feedback yet. I recommend it.

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
I tried it to increase engagement to grow my business. Here to engage users, unique features are available that are very helpful, like contextual messages, push notifications, email, sms, web push notifications and pop-ups, etc. Gamooga has a team who are always available to help you technically, and they also taught me the primary use of all the features.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Gamooga?
review_question_answers.answer: I use Gamooga for marketing in a finance-based company. It is tough to reach people to tell them about your products because mostly they ignore them. I tried various marketing tools, but some were costly, and some are not touched my expectation, but "gamooga" was Quite impressive.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Gamooga?
review_question_answers.answer: Gamooga has lots of exciting features which are very basic. Anyone wants to connect easily with you. So I did not get any negative feedback yet. I recommend it.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I tried it to increase engagement to grow my business. Here to engage users, unique features are available that are very helpful, like contextual messages, push notifications, email, sms, web push notifications and pop-ups, etc. Gamooga has a team who are always available to help you technically, and they also taught me the primary use of all the features.

initial_reviews.review_title: Support is awesome, we can solve the complex use cases with the help of great support team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
There support is really good, their tech support team is capable of solving major complex use cases of E commerce.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
Tool needs to be better, they were not able to keep up to the growing market trends. Online survey, inline content, feedbacks were not available when we were handling the tool

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were able to solve Order status journey from Gamooga and we were able to craft the added to cart journey as well through Gamooga with product recommendations.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
Has one of the best features in the market. Team is very young and agile. Develops new features rapidly. Use cases can be taken live in a matter of few hours only.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
Creating automation workflows takes a bit of getting used to. There is dependency on their support team for any integration and development that is required.

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
Gamooga helps in creating an omnichannel marketing communication for customers. Their platform seemlessly integrates with most communication channels.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Gamooga?
review_question_answers.answer: Has one of the best features in the market. Team is very young and agile. Develops new features rapidly. Use cases can be taken live in a matter of few hours only.

review_question_answers.answer: Creating automation workflows takes a bit of getting used to. There is dependency on their support team for any integration and development that is required.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Gamooga helps in creating an omnichannel marketing communication for customers. Their platform seemlessly integrates with most communication channels.

initial_reviews.review_title: Gamooga as a drop in replacement for ApXor
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
The integration SDK of Gamooga is great with your existing app, without being tied down to any particular development framework or tech stack. This allows for a wide range of usability and creates a overall better experience.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
I dislike the lack of some UI customization choices. Some of the more visual elements - such as feather, shadow and gradient could be added to in-app notifications to make them more appealing.

Recommendations to others considering Gamooga:
Do intense testing and see if this solves your use case

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
Gamooga is solving a lot of problems, but especially it's increasing the in-app navigation for our users. driving engagement and revenue in turn.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Gamooga?
review_question_answers.answer: The integration SDK of Gamooga is great with your existing app, without being tied down to any particular development framework or tech stack. This allows for a wide range of usability and creates a overall better experience.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Gamooga?
review_question_answers.answer: I dislike the lack of some UI customization choices. Some of the more visual elements - such as feather, shadow and gradient could be added to in-app notifications to make them more appealing.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Gamooga:
review_question_answers.answer: Do intense testing and see if this solves your use case

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Gamooga is solving a lot of problems, but especially it's increasing the in-app navigation for our users. driving engagement and revenue in turn.

all_reviews.review_content:

I use Gamooga for marketing in a finance-based company. It is tough to reach people to tell them about your products because mostly they ignore them. I tried various marketing tools, but some were costly, and some are not touched my expectation, but "gamooga" was Quite impressive.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
Gamooga has lots of exciting features which are very basic. Anyone wants to connect easily with you. So I did not get any negative feedback yet. I recommend it.

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
I tried it to increase engagement to grow my business. Here to engage users, unique features are available that are very helpful, like contextual messages, push notifications, email, sms, web push notifications and pop-ups, etc. Gamooga has a team who are always available to help you technically, and they also taught me the primary use of all the features.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
Everything is automated, such as emailing and social communication, which could easily be done via mobile. Now no longer will anyone have to reply. It can be done automatically without even reading it or proofreading it.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
The design is tricky; not everyone can use this .one should have a user manual to learn and manage the software quickly.

Recommendations to others considering Gamooga:
i would recommend it to the company with more than 200 employess

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
The communications done with our users are highly confidential, which has led to the increase in repeat customers. We can now target each user specifically, and Our checkout and purchase rates have also increased significantly.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
I have used the e-commerce & retail feature for one of my clients in the fashion industry, & it helps me review user behaviour & show ads accordingly. which actually resulted in increase in sales

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
Nothing as such, the feature I was using were good to go. I would say that I highly important to understand that it is dependent in some data to do analysis. I would suggest if you can add something for very small or newer retail players

Using the Gamooga for improving user experience, retention & increase user activity on the website

all_reviews.review_title: Solutions designed as per Problem definition
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
The campaign manager capability to automate any industry journeys and run simulation in real-time is very effective for CLV and doing A/B analytics. I also like the post-sales support given by the customer success team on various issues/configuration of the use cases

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
AI based presreptive analytics is a feature which is under roadmap and visualisation of all data sets is also what is desired

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
The challenge of acquiring customers and  retaining and engaging them has given rich ROI and solved business problem with help of Gamooga Adhoc and real-time marketing campaigns

all_reviews.review_content:

The technical support and services provided are simply mindblowing. They have the best Journey Builder in the market which is capable of executing any logical flow one can come up with.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
The user interface. Not the best in the market but certainly right up there, Few changes to the look and feel of the UI should do to turn the tables around.

The tool is very technical and can pratically execute any logic one can imagine.
The support team is brilliant.

Just do it.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Gamooga?
Their intelligent journey builder leaves nothing to chance. The permutations and combinations available for creating numerous journey options are mind boggling and thought out to the last detail.

What do you dislike about Gamooga?
The interface could be a little more aesthetic but at the back end, that requirement is really just a frill.

What problems is Gamooga solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are getting responses like never before. Our customers are enjoying the experience. We have reduced cart abandonment rates and moreover, we are communicating with our users at a highly personalized level.
